title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       Temperatures in Paterson, NJ   Spring: 50-70F, sunny with some rain Summer: 70-90F, mostly sunny with some rain Winter: 0-35F, snow is common Fall: 50-70F For Day to Day Weather Updates: https://weather.com/weather/today/l/USNJ0393:1:US
